description: Curated LCI data for copper production. Contains high-level processes for quick comparison and granular unit processes for custom project modeling.

processes.name: Primary Copper Cathode
processes.description: Cradle-to-gate production of 1kg of primary copper cathode from ore concentrate. Use for Quick Compare.
processes.source_citation: Aggregated from International Copper Association (ICA) reports and Ecoinvent averages. gCO2_per_kg for direct smelting/refining emissions.

processes.name: Recycled Copper Cathode
processes.description: Cradle-to-gate production of 1kg of recycled (secondary) copper cathode from high-grade scrap. Use for Quick Compare.
processes.source_citation: Based on ~80% energy savings principle vs primary (ICA). gCO2_per_kg for direct remelting/refining emissions.

processes.name: Unit Process: Copper Pyrometallurgical Smelting
processes.description: Unit process for smelting and refining 1kg of copper concentrate into cathode.
processes.source_citation: Disaggregated from ICA reports. Assumes transport is handled in raw material acquisition.

processes.name: Unit Process: Copper Hot Rolling
processes.description: Unit process for hot rolling 1kg of copper billet into sheet or plate.
processes.source_citation: Based on industry averages for forming processes.

processes.name: End-of-Life: Collection & Recycling
processes.description: Process for collecting, sorting, and processing 1kg of post-consumer copper scrap.
processes.source_citation: Illustrative data based on ICA reports. Defines the yield of the EoL pathway.
